general.headline: Greystone Housing Impact Investors Reports Second Quarter 2025 Financial Results
general.summary: OMAHA, Neb., Aug. 07, 2025 ( GLOBE NEWSWIRE ) -- On August 7, 2025, Greystone Housing Impact Investors LP ( NYSE: GHI ) ( the "Partnership" ) announced financial results for the three months ended June 30, 2025. The Partnership will host a call today at 4:30 p.m.

general.headline: Bad Credit Personal Loans Guaranteed Approval Market Reaches $253 Billion as GreendayOnline Expands No Credit Check Loan Options
general.summary: DALLAS, TX, Aug. 07, 2025 ( GLOBE NEWSWIRE ) -- The bad credit personal loan market has reached an unprecedented $253 billion in 2025, serving 24.6 million Americans who require alternative lending solutions beyond traditional banking channels.

general.headline: eToro Leverages AI to Redefine Social Investing - Etoro Group  ( NASDAQ:ETOR )
general.summary: AI-powered tools and APIs, enabling users to create AI powered strategies and dashboards. Open-garden marketplace will allow users to build, publish and access customized tools. AI Companion, Tori, answering questions, surfacing personalized insights and guiding users.

general.headline: Applovin Stock Rises 3.5% After Key Trading Signal - AppLovin  ( NASDAQ:APP )
general.summary: APP reverses early decline after the alert AppLovin Corp. APP experienced a Power Inflow today, a significant event for those who follow where smart money goes and value order flow analytics in their trading decisions.
